EngDesc: This threat mimics the behaviour of a FIN scan used by tools such as nmap. A FIN scan sets the FIN bit. Open ports should ignore the probe, while a closed port should reply with a RST packet.

This threat mimics the behaviour of a FIN scan used by tools such as nmap. A FIN scan sets the FIN bit. Open ports should ignore the probe, while a closed port should reply with a RST packet. (IPv6 Version)
